item.title: MIUI OS1.0.5.0.ULJCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K50G China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K50G China

Codename: ingres

Version: OS1.0.5.0.ULJCNXM | 14.0

Size: 6.9 GB

MD5: a1f6da55e456ededaad2870ce2f8876b

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to September 2024. Increased system security.
[Settings]
New: A major update to CarWith's visual experience, with redesigned styles for 6 different horizontal and vertical car system screen sizes. This update includes new cards for maps and music, and Mi AI conversation styles.
New: CarWith now offers enhanced personalization options, including wallpapers, backgrounds, card sorting, widgets, and more
New: Improved connection stability for CarWith and added support for more car models via EasyConnection
Optimization: Enhanced CarWith navigation experience by supporting fullscreen map navigation and introducing a new floating navigation window
Fix: CarWith couldn't automatically connect when the car system was used as a hotspot, due to the phone not automatically connecting to a hotspot without an internet connection
Fix: CarWith would disconnect because the vehicle was incorrectly identified as a Bluetooth device

Download: Here
